title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a blue sports car and a black truck.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving on a busy city street with a blue sports car and a black truck.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.5 m/s). There are 23 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed and following the blue sports car in front of it. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles and pedestrians. The black truck is parked on the side of the road, and the ego vehicle carefully navigates around it. The driver of the ego vehicle is attentive and cautious, constantly scanning the surroundings for any potential risks or obstacles.
